remarks: Polynomial evaluation maps variables to projections.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 12-Mar-2015.)
statement:
evlsvar.q $e |- Q = ( ( I evalSub S ) ` R ) $.
evlsvar.v $e |- V = ( I mVar U ) $.
evlsvar.u $e |- U = ( S |`s R ) $.
evlsvar.b $e |- B = ( Base ` S ) $.
evlsvar.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. W ) $.
evlsvar.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. CRing ) $.
evlsvar.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. ( SubRing ` S ) ) $.
evlsvar.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. I ) $.
evlsvar $p |- ( ph -> ( Q ` ( V ` X ) ) = ( g e. ( B ^m I ) |-> ( g ` X ) ) ) $.
$d B g $.
$d I g $.
$d R g $.
$d S g $.
$d X g $.
